page.title: 12CLOTHING:NORTH NORFOLK
page.content: There is no mains gas in the area though the Bacton North Sea Gas Terminal is only a few miles away. {CLOTHING Casual clothing is the main style seen here, mainly because it is both seaside and country area.Loose, comfortable clothing is worn by men, women and children. Jeans, heavy cotton trousers, are teamed up with assorted coloured tops, odd jackets, and sweaters. Sweaters are often knitted by the women of the family. Wool is the most expensive yarn for this, but many other fibre yarns are available. These are hard wearing, easy to wash and of varying thickness. There are no clothing shops in Sea Palling, but many families shop by mail order catalogue. Home dressmaking is a hobby practised by
